CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 9 PCE of polymer solar cells based on 9,9-dialkylfluorene moieties has been improved to 4.5% with an open circuit voltage ( V oc ) of almost 1 V. 10 Compared with the large number of publications on 9,9dialkylfluorene based D-A alternating copolymers applied in PSCs , less attention was paid to spirobifluorene - based copolymers.

Let's think step by step.

1. 9 PCE: Percentage efficiency of 9% for polymer solar cells.
2. Polymer solar cells: Solar cells made of polymers.
3. 9,9-dialkylfluorene moieties: Organic groups or units based on 9,9-dialkylfluorene.
4. 1 V: Voltage of 1 unit.
5. Open circuit voltage (V oc): The voltage at which the solar cell produces no current.
6. 9,9dialkylfluorene based D-A alternating copolymers: Copolymers with a donor-acceptor (D-A) structure, where the backbone consists of 9,9-dialkylfluorene units.
7. Spirobifluorene - based copolymers: Copolymers with a backbone consisting of spirobifluorene units.

So, the Material Name entities in the paragraph are:

1. Polymer solar cells
2. 9,9-dialkylfluorene moieties
3. 9,9dialkylfluorene based D-A alternating copolymers
4. Spirobifluorene - based copolymers.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. 9,9-dialkylfluorene based D-A alternating copolymers
2. Spirobifluorene - based copolymers.

These are the entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to Material Names.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| 9,9-dialkylfluorene based D-A alternating copolymers |
| Spirobifluorene - based copolymers |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 9 PCE of polymer solar cells based on 9,9-dialkylfluorene moieties has been improved to 4.5% with an open circuit voltage ( V oc ) of almost 1 V. 10 Compared with the large number of publications on 9,9dialkylfluorene based D-A alternating copolymers applied in PSCs , less attention was paid to spirobifluorene - based copolymers.

Let's think step by step.

1. 9 PCE: Percentage of power conversion efficiency
2. polymer solar cells: Type of solar cells
3. 9,9-dialkylfluorene moieties: Chemical structure or group in the polymer
4. V oc: Open circuit voltage
5. 1 V: Voltage value
6. D-A alternating copolymers: Type of copolymers
7. spirobifluorene - based copolymers: Type of copolymers based on spirobifluorene structure.

2. V oc: Open circuit voltage
3. 1 V: Voltage value
4. 9,9-dialkylfluorene based copolymers: Type of copolymers
5. spirobifluorene - based copolymers: Type of copolymers.

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |

| V oc (Open circuit voltage) |
| 1 V (Voltage value) |
| 9,9-dialkylfluorene based copolymers (Type of copolymers) |
| spirobifluorene - based copolymers (Type of copolymers) |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 9 PCE of polymer solar cells based on 9,9-dialkylfluorene moieties has been improved to 4.5% with an open circuit voltage ( V oc ) of almost 1 V. 10 Compared with the large number of publications on 9,9dialkylfluorene based D-A alternating copolymers applied in PSCs , less attention was paid to spirobifluorene - based copolymers.

Let's think step by step.

1. "9 PCE of polymer solar cells based on 9,9-dialkylfluorene moieties" - Percentage of power conversion efficiency for polymer solar cells based on 9,9-dialkylfluorene.
2. "4.5%" - Specific value of the improved percentage of power conversion efficiency.
3. "almost 1 V" - Open circuit voltage value for the improved polymer solar cells.
4. "less attention was paid to spirobifluorene - based copolymers" - This is not a property value, but rather a statement about the level of research attention given to a specific type of copolymers.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. "4.5%" - Specific value of the improved percentage of power conversion efficiency for polymer solar cells based on 9,9-dialkylfluorene.
2. "almost 1 V" - Open circuit voltage value for the improved polymer solar cells.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
